code: import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import classes from'./Counter.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Counter=()=>{const dispach=useDispatch();const counter=useSelector(state=>state.counter);const incrmentHandler=()=>{dispach({type:'increment'});};const decrementHandler=()=>{dispach({type:"decrement"});};const amountHandler=()=>{dispach({type:'amount'});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:classes.counter,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Redux Counter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.value,children:counter}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:incrmentHandler,children:"increment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:decrementHandler,children:"decrement"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:amountHandler,children:"increes by 5"})]})]});};export default Counter;
